JobTitle: Global Program Head, Customer Experience Improvement
JobFullDesc: About the Role As the Global Program Head of Customer Experience improvement, you’ll continuously look for ways to improve business operations and products, ensuring that customers do not face cringeworthy experiences.This role is for a leader who is customer obsessed, consistently looks for ways to improve the customer experience on a continuous basis, can work cross-functionally to solve issues for customers, is able to prioritize high-ROI initiatives, and is able to lead large teams through influence.Your scope will include finding product bugs and surfacing them fast without adequate documentation for Product and Engineering teams to solve, looking for areas where there could be cringeworthy experiences even when things work as per design, being able to recommend and implement improvements, and finding operational gaps which need immediate fixing to provide a better experience for our customers.If designing, creating, and innovating what a world class customer experience at Uber excites you, then come join us build a best in class experience for every Uber customer. What You'll Do:Develop processes and analytical tools to highlight gaps which are causing cringeworthy customer experiencesDevelop programs, evaluate RoI and prioritise them to improve outcomes for the customerDevelop clear strategy leveraging people, process and technology to enhance customer experience, differentiate against competition and make it a competitive advantage for UberLead a team of global program managers and individual contributors to support bug identification, impact assessment and reportingInspire our Engineering, Sales,Operations, Product and Finance functions to act on Voice of the CustomerGrow our talented future leadersBasic Qualifications: At least 7 years of professional experience in general management, customer experience, global scaled service, and/or production operations leading cross-functional teamsPreferred Qualifications: 12 years of
